-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                               Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Kurosaki Ichigo is a 15 year old student, with the ability to see ghosts. 
His life was forever changed when he met Kuchiki Rukia, a Death God, 
who is charged with sending lost souls to the afterlife, known as Soul 
Society. 

Whilst saving Ichigo from the attack of a malevolent ghost known as a 
Hollow, Rukia sustained serious injuries. Unable to finish the battle, 
she offers to share her powers, and responsibilities, with Ichigo..
